The Trip

Movie |

Murder Plot | Husband Wife Relationship

  • OTT Release Date: 15 Oct 2021
  • Genre(s): Action, Comedy, Thriller, Horror
  • Language(s): English
  • Director(s): Tommy Wirkola, Kenneth Olaf Hjellum, Laura Ugolini, Annett Ødegaard, Matthew Cooper See all Crew
  • Cast(s): Noomi Rapace, Aksel Hennie, Atle Antonsen, Christian Rubeck, André Eriksen See all Cast & Crew
  • Duration: 1h 53min
  • Music: Christian Wibe,Tormod Ringnes,Baard H. Ingebretsen,Johan Husvik,Marius Paus Brovold
  • Award(s): Queensland & Northern Territory Gold 2022 (Won)
    Amanda 2022 (Nominated) Awards List
  • Similar To: Upgrade, The Predator
  • Story:

    A dysfunctional couple heads to a remote cabin to reconnect, but each has intentions to kill the other. Before they can carry out their plans, unexpected visitors arrive and they are faced with greater danger. Directed by Tommy Wirkola.

    Full Story
6.9/10

STORY AND RATINGS

Story

A dysfunctional couple heads to a remote cabin to reconnect, but each has intentions to kill the other. Before they can carry out their plans, unexpected visitors arrive and they are faced with greater danger. Directed by Tommy Wirkola.

TRIVIA

Trivia

When Lisa and Lars are playing Scrabble, two of the visible words are Død (dead) and Snø (snow). Dead Snow and its sequel are also films by Tommy Wirkola.

Roy has a dead snow tattoo
